definitions.definition: The office or role of president.
definitions.example: After many years as a party leader, she finally ascended to the presidency.

definitions.definition: The bureaucratic organization and governmental initiatives devolving directly from the president.
definitions.example: Because of the president's lame duck status, the presidency was often hampered by congressional actions.

definitions.definition: The time during which one is president; a president's term of office.
definitions.example: Ernest was a historian specializing in the presidency of Herbert Hoover.
